name: part_000
file: tmp_【#夏色まつり生誕祭】4回目のバースデー♪【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [C-J0mGVamNc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening montage featuring highlights from past performances and celebratory messages.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs the song 'Fans' on stage in her idol outfit.

subtitles.original: START the SCREEN
subtitles.english: START the SCREEN

subtitles.original:
ファンサ
作詞・作曲:HoneyWorks
subtitles.english:
Fans
Lyrics/Music: HoneyWorks

subtitles.original: 好きになって　もっと
subtitles.english: Please love me more,

subtitles.original: 私を見て　もっと
subtitles.english: Look at me more,

subtitles.original: 恩返しは　愛のこもった投げキッスで
subtitles.english: I'll repay you with an air kiss full of love.

subtitles.original: 気のせいじゃない　目は合ってるよ
subtitles.english: It's not your imagination, our eyes met.

subtitles.original: ハート作って　恋しちゃってください
subtitles.english: Make a heart and fall in love with me.

subtitles.original: やれること　なんでもします
subtitles.english: I'll do anything I can.

subtitles.original: NGなしで　体当たり挑戦
subtitles.english: No NGs, I'll give it my all.

subtitles.original: エゴサで見つけたアンチのコメ
subtitles.english: Anti comments I found while ego-searching.

subtitles.original: ふざけんな　誰より分かってるし
subtitles.english: Stop it! I know myself better than anyone.

subtitles.original: でも大丈夫　ここに立てばみんながいる
subtitles.english: But it's okay, because you're all here when I stand here.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 好きになって　もっと
subtitles.english: Please love me more,

subtitles.original: 私を見て　もっと
subtitles.english: Look at me more,

subtitles.original: 恩返しは　愛のこもった投げキッスで
subtitles.english: I'll repay you with an air kiss full of love.

subtitles.original: 虜にする　もっと
subtitles.english: I'll captivate you more,

subtitles.original: 夢を見せる　もっと
subtitles.english: I'll show you more dreams,

subtitles.original: 楽しんでって！愛のこもったスペシャルナイト
subtitles.english: Please enjoy! A special night full of love.

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: I'm giving you some fan service!

subtitles.original: お手紙も　書いてください
subtitles.english: Please write me letters too.

subtitles.original: 何度も読んで　宝物にします
subtitles.english: I'll read them over and over and treasure them.

subtitles.original: スキャンダル　まだ早いけど
subtitles.english: A scandal... it's still too early, but...

subtitles.original: 裏切りません　宣言しときます
subtitles.english: I won't betray you, I'll declare it now.

subtitles.original: 嫉妬嫌がらせには負けない
subtitles.english: I won't lose to jealousy or harassment.

subtitles.original: ふざけんな　実力で勝ってやる
subtitles.english: Stop it! I'll win with my talent.

subtitles.original: だからやめない　負けず嫌い私はいる
subtitles.english: So I won't quit, my competitive self is here.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 拳上げて　もっと
subtitles.english: Raise your fists more,

subtitles.original: 汗をかいて　もっと
subtitles.english: Work up a sweat more,

subtitles.original: 恩返しは　愛のこもったまつりビームで
subtitles.english: I'll repay you with a Matsuri Beam full of love.

subtitles.original: 大歓声　もっと
subtitles.english: A loud cheer, more,

subtitles.original: まだまだね　もっと
subtitles.english: Not yet, more,

subtitles.original: 受け止めてね　愛のこもったわがままソング
subtitles.english: Please accept it, my selfish song full of love.

subtitles.original: ファンサしちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: I'm giving you some fan service!

subtitles.original: 終わりが近づく　寂しいね
subtitles.english: The end is near, it's lonely, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しいのに　泣きそうだよ
subtitles.english: Even though it's fun, I feel like crying.
